location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, on board the HC Cruizer Benaresto James Pringle Riach, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a circular (not present) from the General Department of the Bombay Government concerning the Native Pension Fund. It is requested that the details of said fund are made known to eligible persons on the establishment of the Bushire Residency; particular attention is drawn to public native servants at Bushire, as they had not previously been eligible to subscribe to the fund.
